website_summaries.verdict: Well-fitting, soft fabric, and less expensive than a whole new recliner.
pros: Comes in black, blue, chocolate, coffee, dark blue, dark cyan, dark magenta, gray, ivory white, light khaki, light yellow, wine and yellow green
cons: Installation instructions for foam rollers aren't clear – many assume they are part of packaging and throw them out

customer_reviews.title: Works well and matches
customer_reviews.text: With furniture bolted to the floor in an RV, this was a bit of a challenge to install, but once done, it makes our 20 year old coach's original sofa and recliner look almost new. Fit is a little loose, but that's a minor concern, after all, its a slip cover, not a re-upholster job. WE're very happy with it and the fabric is very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Thespian

customer_reviews.title: Rod holders are the only issue
customer_reviews.text: These made my chairs look 10 times better. I think they will hold up and overall it is a huge upgrade. I gave 4 stars because the little rolls they supply to hold the fabric in seem to come out every time we get in an out of the chairs. With 3 small kids they do a lot of up and down off the chair. The gray is more like a grey/blue but matched very closely to my couch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine ordered this and I liked it so much I got it for myself. Little bit of a pain to put on initially but no big deal and looks great. I love that it covers the entire chair including the back and the sides, and that it is machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great softness and quality. Just read all of the description first!
customer_reviews.text: The material and quality it really good in this product. I am only rating it lower because it must fit in a chair exactly like one in picture. It does not fit in a recliner. It also does not have a hole for a recliner. I believe I just purchase the wrong item.
customer_reviews.author: rhonda hanft

customer_reviews.title: I love the chair cover the color is perfect it fits ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the chair cover the color is perfect it fits the chair perfectly and of course it really looks nice. The stretchy material is perfect and helps it to fit and hold it"s shape and position when sitting on it. I don"t have to keep pulling it up or adjust it all the time, The material is perfect and i just love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but works.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it was supposed to do and gave my recliner a facelift and some protection. It does have some drawbacks though. The footrest is now much harder to open fully. The reclining handle being covered isn't ideal eother. The styrofoam locks come out all the time compared to the couch version of this cover. Overall though, this isn't a bad cover for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt Fit Well
customer_reviews.text: My chair is well within the dimensions defined here, and it sits baggy on the chair, and looks terrible. Yes it will cover the chair and protect it, but its a bit tight when you open the footrest, and yet still sits terribly baggy when the footrest is down. I ended up taking it off. Isnt worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fine a perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Just really loose but I guess that is expected because they are made to fit any size recliners
customer_reviews.author: CVDC

customer_reviews.title: Good color. Fabric is soft
customer_reviews.text: Durable. Good color. Fabric is soft. Once you give it a good tuck into the cushions, you're set. My chair had nasty strains that I couldn't take out. transformed it!
customer_reviews.author: VioletMay

customer_reviews.title: Fabric looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: This fit my chair nicely. However...it looks really cheap and poor qualty. Like I draped a paper towel over my chair. Product was not expensive but it looks tacky and uninviting to sit on. I would not purchase again unless quality of fabric was improved.
customer_reviews.author: Gina L Pozza

customer_reviews.title: Not big enough
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed with this product I put it on our recliner and it fit, but when my husband went to put the feet up the cover wouldn't allow my husband to fully recline unless he took the cover off the foot rest. Very disappointed. As I believe it stated that one size fits all. Well maybe if you have a small recliner, but not the larger one we have.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: recliner cover
customer_reviews.text: this is great. the only thing that needs improvement is you have to keep tucking it in.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Fits nice
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the look of it on my chair. Good quality fabric. Returned without difficulties
customer_reviews.author: T. Goldenstein

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit!
customer_reviews.text: I just received product yesterday so I can’t rate it in several areas. It fit my leather sofa, the reclining chairs on each end. I love how it fits under sofa.
customer_reviews.author: TBT

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to match a sofa cover and it worked great. Made a very old chair (30+ years) look new again!
customer_reviews.author: M. West

customer_reviews.title: Fits my recliner perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Has a clean look, easy to install. Changed the look of my recliner enormously.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Way to Cover a Recliner!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to cover my man chair recliner which is fully automated, moves up and down all sort of configurations so the cover gets a workout. I have to re-tuck it sometimes mainly from me getting up and down but overall I am well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: great fit !!
customer_reviews.text: I have had slip covers before and having a recliner and reclining couch makes it difficult to find slip covers to fit. These look awesome perfect fit looks like i reupholstered my furniture material durable great for pets. in fact i am probably going to purchase a second set to switch them out.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie huertas

customer_reviews.title: Seems good for now...
customer_reviews.text: The fit is excellent, but the durability may be a bit questionable. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and easy to put on couch.  Keeps the dog hair down a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and easy to put on couch. Keeps the dog hair down a lot.
customer_reviews.author: FinFun54

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: This item would not fit my chair. I returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: katz

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my recliners. Fits well. Really like the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: mkm

customer_reviews.title: True to color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Too big for my recliner. Had to sew/Velcro parts of it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Stoner

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cover.Fits perfect for my husband's recliner. Would recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Nanajen68

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit
customer_reviews.text: Well it just really does not fit well. Maybe our recliner is larger than the cover covers. Or maybe its smaller I have not clue
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: great sofa covers
customer_reviews.text: i like them my only issue is that they slip so idk how i'm going to fix this issue any ideas please share thank you
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the slipcover a few days. So I cannot rate it at this time. I will say it's a beautiful color exactly as shown Seems to be well made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definately worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Fit my lazy boy recliner great even in the recline position. The only downfall was that there was no opening for the reclining handle but it still fit around it ok.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best slipcover I've ever purchased. The cover went on very easily. The quality of the fabric is better than I anticipated. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stretch and fot the recliner I needed to cover
customer_reviews.text: Great stretch and fot the recliner I needed to cover. The color is more on the blue shade than gray but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Too much stretch, too big
customer_reviews.text: They are too stretchy and much to big for the lower end of the measurement scale
customer_reviews.author: Eileen M. Molloy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Good quality
customer_reviews.text: So far feeling the purchase is great . Good feel and richness seen
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: No hole for the handle
customer_reviews.text: Stays in place, love the material and pattern. Don't like the fact you buy a recliner cover and there is no hole for the handle. Had I known before purchase I would have made a different selection.
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Recliner
customer_reviews.text: Love the color & texture. A little larger than my recliner, also no hole for right hand handle
customer_reviews.author: Linda Cox

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Cover is very flexible, comfy and fits well to my chair!
customer_reviews.author: Haley K.

customer_reviews.title: N/a
customer_reviews.text: There is no opening for the handle for the foot lift
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: measure chair for dimentions
customer_reviews.text: cover was good quality and fit my sons gaming chair nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Theprincess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: The recliner slipcover is easy to "install" and fits perfectly! Color is very rich. Very pleases with it.
customer_reviews.author: med miss

customer_reviews.title: the color ivory white is more of a yellow color ...
customer_reviews.text: the color ivory white is more of a yellow color did not match my furniture so I had to return it
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Gueye

customer_reviews.title: Great fit but check your seams.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great but had a whole in one of the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be happier. I didn’t need the arms so I just tucked them down the sides of the cushion. I’m purchasing covers for the other 4 recliners.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Romanowski

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a brand new recliner
customer_reviews.text: I have a recliner that is part leather on the outside and microfiber suede seating..it was stained awful no matter how much I cleaned it! So I took a chance and got this and I’m very happy I did! Fits perfect and really soft. I got the light grey color😀
customer_reviews.author: Romancenoveljunkie

customer_reviews.title: Recliner can’t recline with cover on
customer_reviews.text: It fits fine and the color is accurate but it is really hard to open the recliner to recline with the cover on it. The handle is also under the fabric so it’s difficult to use as an actual recliner. I was hoping that since it was specifically designed for a recliner it would allow the recliner to function as such but that’s not the case. Disappointed with this purchase. I’m wondering if it would have been better to get a cover that had separate pieces that would allow it to open correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good fit. Takes a little time to get It right. Lots of tucking but when sat on it didn’t wrinkle much when Someone got up. Use the foam that is included to get a snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L.

customer_reviews.title: Well, hot dog!  This worked so nicely!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice slipcover. You have to tuck the cover in after reclining; but the color is great, the material is soft and did you see that it has a side pocket?! Game. Changer.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Recliner Slip Cover
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease and stretch when putting it on our recliner. It fits well and looks smooth, the texture of the cover makes it look more like upholstery rather than something that has been put on top
customer_reviews.author: Elaine C.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and is easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I got another chair cover first, but this one was far superior to it. The foam inserts that come with it help keep the material in place, whether reclining or not. There is no hole for the lever, but it doesn’t stop it from working. The faux leather on my chair was flaking away, but the chair was still comfortable — this cover has made the chair functional and attractive again!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Modean

customer_reviews.title: too small!
customer_reviews.text: I had to not cover the foot rest because it's too small. Decided to finally use it, my time to return it expired so I had to keep it!
customer_reviews.author: Rosario

customer_reviews.title: too stretchy
customer_reviews.text: it was what it said except it became stretchier after sitting in it and would not tighten back up, required constant tucking even with the white foam supports.
customer_reviews.author: patriciabanks

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to
customer_reviews.text: The chair I use this for is a small recliner. The cover is too big but still works to protect it
customer_reviews.author: Anita Willie

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This product fits out rocker recliner beautifully. The material is sturdier than other slipcovers we have tried in the past. Love how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J O Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover
customer_reviews.text: Item fits well and looks great. Will update down the line regarding durability.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Fits Well.
customer_reviews.text: We really like this cover. Four stars as it is not quite as thick as expected but so far it's doing the job it was meant for, keeping chair clean of dog hair and scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Joel K. Price

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that resembles the picture is the color. The cover doesn't stay put. It always looks like a wrong sloppy cover. Sad
customer_reviews.author: Eydie Hauer

customer_reviews.title: Goes on easy!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. It has made my old, out of date sofa look modern and new!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Klein

customer_reviews.title: A little loose
customer_reviews.text: Product does the job although it's a little loose, color is more tan than ivory
customer_reviews.author: Bertram A. Lightbourne

product_meta.title: CHUN YI 1-Piece Stretch Spandex Jacquard Recliner Chair Slipcovers Sofa Covers Recliner Cover Coat Furniture Protector with Elastic Bottom Side Pocket Fit for Living Room (Recliner Chair, Gray)
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR FABRIC: 85% polyester 15% spandex fabric makes our sofa covers more stretchy and durable, ensuring both good function and comfort. Various adorable colors are available to decorate your sofa. Protect your new sofa from daily wear and tear, spills and stains, and also give your favorite sofa a new rejuvenated look if your sofa looks a bit broken or not so new.

IDEAL FIT: Our slipcover fits most standard recliner: 30 inch-37.5 inch(front) and 24 inch-32 inch(back), up to 29 inch-36.5 inch high, and up to 26 inch-34 inch deep. With featured side pocket design, you can put your remote, magazines and other small items on side pockets for easy access. If you are not sure about how to choose, contact us and we will help you with all our heart.

STAY IN PLACE: The recliner stretch slipcover can be enwrapped fully which help to provides excellent all-around protection. 360 degree comprehensive protection will protect your recliner from stains, spills and abrasion.Tuck the fabric into the grooves to make it more tight and the elastic tie at the bottom will secure the slipcover stay in place firmly. For detailed installation steps, please check our attached video.

EFFORTLESS CARE: Not only will our recliner cover protect your recliner from accidental dirt like biscuit crumbs and daily wear and tear, but also it is very easy to clean, saving you much effort. Machine washable with similar colors. Do Not Bleach. For drying, tumble dry low and remove them promptly from dryer.

TIPS: With a brief style and appealing colors, our slipcovers match well for your most different styles of furniture and decoration. Due to the diverse light and monitor display, colors may slightly differ from picture and product, but we never stop trying our best to reduce the color difference between picture and product to the minimum as far as possible.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars237 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
